alert.note: Alert for Bradley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bradley and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Cohutta, or 7 miles northeast of Ringgold, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Harrison, Wildwood Lake, South Cleveland, Collegedale, East Brainerd, Red Clay State Park, Flint Springs, Apison and Ooltewah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
